title: Uzbek president meets President Alvi at Aiwan-e-Sadr
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 4 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi Friday warmly received his counterpart from Uzbekistan Shavkat Mirziyoyev here at the Aiwan-e-Sadr.
The President of Uzbekistan is on a two-day state visit to Pakistan.
President Dr Arif Alvi and the Uzbek president held a meeting discussing matters of common interest.
President Alvi hosted a luncheon in honour of President Mirziyoyev and his delegation.
